Endpoints¶

Module for container class of all TFC endpoints and high level exceptions around API access.

exception terrasnek.api.InvalidTFCTokenException¶

Cannot instantiate TFC Api class without a valid TFC_TOKEN.

class terrasnek.api.TFC(api_token, url='https://app.terraform.io', verify=True)¶

Super class for access to all TFC Endpoints.

set_org(org_name)¶

Sets the organization to use for org specific endpoints. This method must be called for their respective endpoints to work.

terrasnek
